en: If you are going abroad, it's necessary to have a passport.
zh: 如果你要出国，护照是必不可少的。

en: The circumstances did not allow me to go abroad.
zh: 情况不允许我出国。

en: The cost of flying overseas has risen with the cost of fuel.
zh: 由于燃料成本上涨，飞往海外的费用也随之增加。

en: Japanese tourists abroad are big spenders.
zh: 在国外的日本游客是消费大户。

en: Overseas subsidiaries are putting out top-of the-line products.
zh: 海外子公司正在推出顶级产品。

en: When you go abroad, you'd better keep in mind that tipping is necessary.
zh: 出国时，你最好记住给小费是必要的。

en: You should take another pair of glasses when you go abroad.
zh: 出国时，你应该再带一副眼镜。

en: When you travel abroad, you feel very expansive, and it's easy to overspend in a mood like that.
zh: 出国旅行时，你会感到非常开阔，在这种心情下很容易过度消费。

en: I've never been abroad.
zh: 我从未出过国。

en: Whenever I go abroad, I suffer from jet lag and diarrhea.
zh: 每次出国，我都会遭受时差和腹泻的困扰。

en: Our international sales continue to grow, bringing the name of Toyo Computer into businesses world-wide.
zh: 我们的国际销售额持续增长，将东洋电脑的名字带入了世界各地的企业。

en: By studying overseas, students can come into contact with other manners and customs.
zh: 通过在海外学习，学生可以接触到其他的礼仪和习俗。

en: Japanese children brought up overseas sometimes face great difficulty in adjusting themselves to Japanese schools after returning, even though they have a perfect command of Japanese.
zh: 在日本国外长大的日本孩子，即使能说一口流利的日语，回国后有时也很难适应日本的学校。

en: Neptune is the eighth planet of the solar system.
zh: 海王星是太阳系的第八颗行星。

en: I work for a shipping company.
zh: 我在一家航运公司工作。

en: Let's get a picture of us with the sea in the background.
zh: 让我们拍一张以大海为背景的照片吧。

en: When I contemplate the sea, I feel calm.
zh: 当我凝视大海时，我感到平静。

en: It is no more than half a mile to the sea.
zh: 到海边只有不到半英里。

en: It is no more than a mile to the sea.
zh: 到海边只有不到一英里。

en: Let's drive as far as the sea.
zh: 我们开车到海边吧。

en: The sea covers nearly three-fourths of the earth's surface.
zh: 海洋覆盖了地球表面近四分之三的面积。

en: The sea was truly calm.
zh: 大海真的很平静。

en: The ocean was calm.
zh: 海洋很平静。

en: Oceans do not so much divide the world as unite it.
zh: 海洋与其说是分割世界，不如说是连接世界。

en: The ocean melted into the sky on the horizon.
zh: 在地平线上，大海融入了天空。

en: The sea was running high.
zh: 海面波涛汹涌。

en: The sea was as smooth as glass.
zh: 海面像玻璃一样平静。

en: The ocean affords various kinds of resources.
zh: 海洋提供了各种各样的资源。

en: The sea looks calm and smooth.
zh: 大海看起来平静而平缓。

en: The sea is far from calm.
zh: 大海远非平静。

en: The sea grew wilder and wilder.
zh: 大海变得越来越狂暴。

en: The sea is very wide.
zh: 大海非常宽阔。

en: The rise and fall of the sea is governed by the moon.
zh: 海水的涨落受月球控制。

en: The sea ice is highly variable - frozen solid during cold, calm weather and broken up in large areas of open water during storms.
zh: 海冰变化很大——在寒冷、平静的天气里会完全冻结，而在暴风雨期间会破碎成大片开阔水域。

en: Who shall ever unravel the mysteries of the sea?
zh: 谁能解开大海的奥秘呢？

en: A variety of creatures can be seen under the water.
zh: 在水下可以看到各种各样的生物。

en: You can not drink the seawater, for it is too salty.
zh: 你不能喝海水，因为它太咸了。

en: Marine plants grow on the sea bed.
zh: 海洋植物生长在海底。

en: Could you change my room to one with a view of the ocean?
zh: 你能帮我换一间能看到海景的房间吗？

en: Do you have a table with a view of the ocean?
zh: 你们有能看到海景的桌子吗？

en: Despite having lived near the sea, she still cannot swim.
zh: 尽管住在海边，她仍然不会游泳。

en: Far away across the sea lies the sunny land of Italy.
zh: 遥远的海那边是阳光明媚的意大利。

en: There is a low hill near the sea.
zh: 海边附近有一座小山。

en: I'd like a room facing the ocean instead.
zh: 我想要一间面向大海的房间。

en: I'd like to get a view of the ocean.
zh: 我想看看大海的景色。

en: It's on the coast about 13 kilometers to the north of its more famous neighbor, Dover.
zh: 它位于海岸边，在它更著名的邻居多佛以北约13公里处。

en: I cast my net into the sea.
zh: 我把网撒向大海。

en: If you go underwater, hold your nose and blow to clear your ears.
zh: 如果你潜入水下，捏住鼻子并吹气以清除耳压。

en: Most creatures in the sea are affected by pollution.
zh: 海洋中的大多数生物都受到污染的影响。

en: I would rather go to the mountains than to the beach.
zh: 我宁愿去山区也不愿去海滩。

en: Surrounded by the sea, Japan has a mild climate.
zh: 日本四面环海，气候温和。

en: Which do you like better, the sea or the mountains?
zh: 你更喜欢大海还是山？

en: The colors of the sea and the sky blend into each other.
zh: 大海和天空的颜色融为一体。

en: The sea is to fish what the sky is to birds.
zh: 大海之于鱼，犹如天空之于鸟。

en: You must be careful when swimming in the sea.
zh: 在海里游泳时你必须小心。

en: It is fun to swim in the sea.
zh: 在海里游泳很有趣。

en: Swimming in the sea is great fun.
zh: 在海里游泳非常有趣。

en: Some children are swimming in the sea.
zh: 一些孩子正在海里游泳。

en: To swim in the ocean is my greatest pleasure.
zh: 在海里游泳是我最大的乐趣。

en: The sea is down.
zh: 大海在下面。

en: The sea got rough, so that we had to give up fishing.
zh: 海面变得波涛汹涌，所以我们不得不放弃捕鱼。

en: Some people like the sea; others prefer the mountains.
zh: 有些人喜欢大海，另一些人更喜欢山。

en: The sea came into sight.
zh: 我们看到了大海。

en: The sea indented the coastline.
zh: 大海侵蚀了海岸线。

en: The sun rose from the sea.
zh: 太阳从海上升起。

en: Winds from the sea are moist.
zh: 来自海洋的风是潮湿的。

en: The sea is not clear.
zh: 海水不干净。

en: Turtles live to a great age.
zh: 海龟非常长寿。

en: Improved medical technology has been one of the spin-offs of the space program.
zh: 改进的医疗技术是太空计划的副产品之一。

en: There's a lot of room left for improvement.
zh: 还有很大的改进空间。

en: Show your ticket at the barrier.
zh: 请在检票口出示您的票。

en: The reformers were subject to every attack from the Establishment.
zh: 改革者受到来自当权派的各种攻击。

en: It is never too late to mend.
zh: 亡羊补牢，为时未晚。

en: I have nothing particular to say.
zh: 我没有什么特别要说的。

en: I thought it would be a good idea to get back in touch with Japanese culture and history.
zh: 我认为重新接触日本文化和历史是个好主意。

en: I groped for a flashlight.
zh: 我摸索着找手电筒。

en: She shone her torch onto the floor before us.
zh: 她用手电筒照着我们面前的地板。

en: Flashing lights transmit messages between ships and to motorists along city streets.
zh: 闪光灯在船只之间以及向城市街道上的驾车者传递信息。

en: I have plenty of money with me.
zh: 我身上带了很多钱。

en: The good old days have gone, never to return.
zh: 美好的旧时光已经一去不复返了。

en: I like to talk about the good old days.
zh: 我喜欢谈论美好的旧时光。

en: We're on our way home.
zh: 我们正在回家的路上。

en: The monster's smile was cruel.
zh: 那个怪物的笑容很残忍。

en: The Sphinx howled with rage.
zh: 狮身人面像愤怒地咆哮着。

en: Hearing the monster's footsteps, they began running in all directions.
zh: 听到怪物的脚步声，他们开始向四面八方跑去。

en: Cover up the injured man with this blanket.
zh: 用这条毯子盖住受伤的人。

en: You will hurt yourself.
zh: 你会伤到自己的。

en: Don't cry trouble half-way.
zh: 不要杞人忧天。

en: We could hear the groans of the injured man.
zh: 我们能听到受伤者的呻吟声。

en: An injury put the shortstop out of action.
zh: 一次受伤使游击手退出了比赛。

en: She fumbled with the glasses as she brought them in.
zh: 她端着杯子进来时，笨手笨脚的。

en: A good appetite, sound sleep, and regular motions are the three signs of good health.
zh: 良好的食欲、充足的睡眠和规律的排便是身体健康的三个标志。

en: Some people pursue only pleasure.
zh: 有些人只追求享乐。

en: She greeted me with a pleasant smile.
zh: 她用愉快的微笑迎接我。

en: Mere decay produces richer life.
zh: 仅仅是腐烂就能产生更丰富的生命。

en: Would you please replace the broken one promptly?
zh: 请您尽快更换破损的那个好吗？

en: I replaced the broken cups with new ones.
zh: 我用新的杯子替换了破损的杯子。

en: The broken window was boarded up.
zh: 破损的窗户被木板封了起来。

en: Cold blasts from the broken window chilled us.
zh: 从破损的窗户吹来的寒风让我们感到寒冷。

en: I fix broken radios.
zh: 我修理坏了的收音机。

en: The clock that got broken must be repaired right away.
zh: 那个坏了的钟必须马上修理。

en: Can you fix the broken radio?
zh: 你能修好这个坏了的收音机吗？

en: I made a temporary repair to the broken door.
zh: 我对坏了的门做了临时修理。

en: It took three hours to put the broken toy together.
zh: 把这个坏了的玩具拼起来花了三个小时。

en: The engineers blew up the bridge because it was about to collapse.
zh: 工程师炸毁了桥，因为它快要倒塌了。

en: You must switch off the power before checking the circuit.
zh: 检查电路前，你必须关掉电源。

en: Recovery was almost impossible.
zh: 恢复几乎是不可能的。

en: May I have coupon tickets?
zh: 我可以要优惠券吗？

en: It was twenty years ago as I look back on it.
zh: 当我回首往事时，那已经是二十年前的事了。

en: I order you to turn right.
zh: 我命令你向右转。

en: About face!
zh: 向后转！

en: If it isn't out of your way, please take this letter to the post office.
zh: 如果顺路的话，请把这封信带到邮局。

en: There was a thick fog around.
zh: 周围有浓雾。

en: Don't talk around it.
zh: 别拐弯抹角。

en: Stop beating around the bush and give it to me straight!
zh: 别再拐弯抹角了，直接告诉我吧！

en: Don't say it in a roundabout way.
zh: 不要用迂回的方式说。

en: Don't beat around the bush.
zh: 别拐弯抹角。

en: You have to pay the price.
zh: 你必须付出代价。

en: I am considering how to settle the matter.
zh: 我正在考虑如何解决这件事。

en: All answers must be written according to the instructions.
zh: 所有答案都必须按照说明书写。

en: Finding a solution that worked was a process of trial and error.
zh: 找到一个可行的解决方案是一个反复试验的过程。

en: It was apparent that there was no way out.
zh: 很明显，没有出路了。

en: The settlement is a matter of time.
zh: 解决只是时间问题。

en: His explanation that a solution would take time didn't satisfy anyone.
zh: 他解释说解决问题需要时间，这并没有让任何人满意。

en: There are many problems to solve.
zh: 有很多问题需要解决。

en: We have some pressing problems to solve.
zh: 我们有一些紧迫的问题需要解决。

en: I will show you how to solve it.
zh: 我会告诉你如何解决它。

en: He went to France to brush up on his speaking ability.
zh: 他去法国是为了提高他的口语能力。

en: Being a good conversationalist does not just mean being a good speaker of English.
zh: 成为一个好的健谈者不仅仅意味着英语说得好。

en: In conversation, one is likely to find out certain things about the other person quite easily.
zh: 在谈话中，人们很容易发现对方的某些事情。

en: Do you know that conversation is one of the greatest pleasures in life?
zh: 你知道谈话是人生最大的乐趣之一吗？

en: When you enter a conversation, you should have something to say.
zh: 当你加入谈话时，你应该有话要说。

en: Won't you join our conversation?
zh: 你要不要加入我们的谈话？

en: Wit is to conversation what salt is to food.
zh: 机智之于谈话，犹如盐之于食物。

en: Why don't you join in the conversation?
zh: 你为什么不加入谈话呢？

en: Cross off the names of the people who have paid their dues.
zh: 把已经交了会费的人的名字划掉。

en: With regard to the membership fee, you must ask the treasurer of the club.
zh: 关于会员费，你必须问俱乐部的财务主管。

en: Many members dropped out of the club when the dues were raised.
zh: 当会费提高时，许多成员退出了俱乐部。

en: The hall resounded with pealing bells.
zh: 大厅里回荡着洪亮的钟声。

en: For whom will you vote for president?
zh: 你打算投票给谁当总统？

en: The President did me the courtesy of replying to my letter.
zh: 总统很客气地回复了我的信。

en: You cannot be too polite when you meet the president.
zh: 当你见到总统时，再怎么礼貌也不为过。

en: The talks continued for two days.
zh: 会谈持续了两天。

en: The hall was filled with such a large audience that there wasn't even standing room.
zh: 大厅里挤满了观众，甚至没有站立的地方。

en: This hall was full of people.
zh: 这个大厅里挤满了人。

en: The concert hall was so jam-packed there wasn't room to breathe.
zh: 音乐厅里挤得水泄不通，连呼吸的空间都没有。

en: The congregation was moved by the fine sermon.
zh: 会众被精彩的布道所感动。

en: We held a party in honor of the 20th anniversary of our company.
zh: 我们举办了一个派对来庆祝我们公司成立20周年。

en: Send this parcel to him in care of his company.
zh: 请把这个包裹寄给他，转交他的公司。

en: We need a new leader to pull our company together.
zh: 我们需要一个新的领导者来团结我们的公司。

en: Whoever leaves the office last should turn off the light.
zh: 最后离开办公室的人应该关灯。

en: On behalf of the company, I would like to express our hearty thanks to you all.
zh: 我谨代表公司，向各位表示衷心的感谢。

en: Management of a company is different from ownership of a company.
zh: 公司的管理权和所有权是不同的。

en: Don't put the company in danger.
zh: 不要让公司陷入危险境地。

en: I hope I can hold on to my job.
zh: 我希望我能保住我的工作。

en: Hans sold the patent to a company.
zh: 汉斯把专利卖给了一家公司。

en: Call me at the office.
zh: 在办公室给我打电话。

en: I had my wallet stolen on my way to the office.
zh: 我在去办公室的路上钱包被偷了。

en: The company engaged him as an advisor.
zh: 公司聘请他担任顾问。

en: When you return to your company, don't forget to keep in touch with me.
zh: 当你回到你的公司时，别忘了和我保持联系。

en: The company rejected his request for a transfer.
zh: 公司拒绝了他的调职请求。

en: The company presented him with a gold watch on the day he retired.
zh: 在他退休那天，公司赠送给他一块金表。

en: The company pays me 100,000 yen in various allowances a month in addition to the regular salary.
zh: 除了正常工资外，公司每月还支付我10万日元的各种补贴。

en: The company appealed for people to take voluntary resignation.
zh: 公司呼吁人们自愿辞职。

en: The company was in the red and went under.
zh: 公司亏损严重，倒闭了。

en: The company moved its corporate domicile to Hong Kong for tax purposes.
zh: 为了税务目的，公司将其注册地迁至香港。

en: The company gave him enough pension to live on.
zh: 公司给了他足够的养老金以维持生计。

en: The company is caught up in a serious business slump.
zh: 公司正陷入严重的商业衰退。

en: The company is struggling for survival.
zh: 公司正在为生存而挣扎。

en: Our advice is that the company invest in new equipment.
zh: 我们的建议是公司投资新设备。

en: The office was besieged by anxious inquiries.
zh: 办公室被焦虑的询问所包围。

en: The company rewarded him with promotion.
zh: 公司以晋升奖励了他。

en: The company exploited its workers with low pay.
zh: 公司以低工资剥削工人。

en: The company is attempting to stagger work hours.
zh: 公司正试图实行错峰工作制。

en: The firm went under due to lack of capital.
zh: 由于缺乏资金，该公司倒闭了。

en: The company has growing pains now.
zh: 公司现在正经历成长的烦恼。

en: The company is turning to export markets to make up for a decline in domestic sales.
zh: 公司正转向出口市场，以弥补国内销售额的下降。

en: The office has been topsy-turvy since the merger upset everything.
zh: 自从合并扰乱了一切，办公室就一直乱七八糟的。

en: The community is made up of individuals.
zh: 这个社区由个人组成。

en: The company took action against its former accountant.
zh: 公司对其前会计采取了行动。

en: The company is in financial difficulties.
zh: 公司正面临财务困难。

en: The firm has a great deal of trust in your ability.
zh: 公司非常信任你的能力。

en: The company managed to keep afloat.
zh: 公司设法维持运营。

en: The company plans to close its U.S. sales unit in New York.
zh: 该公司计划关闭其位于纽约的美国销售部门。

en: The company bought shares in the venture.
zh: 公司购买了该合资企业的股份。

en: The company abandoned that project.
zh: 公司放弃了那个项目。

en: The company drew back from the project.
zh: 公司从该项目中撤回。

en: The company was in want of money.
zh: 公司当时很缺钱。

en: The company called in all the baby food made in July.
zh: 公司召回了七月份生产的所有婴儿食品。

en: The company went after its no. 1 customer gripe: power outages.
zh: 公司着手解决其头号客户抱怨的问题：停电。

en: The company's gamble paid off.
zh: 公司的赌博获得了回报。

en: The company's profits soared.
zh: 公司的利润飙升。

en: It took me several days to balance the company books.
zh: 我花了几天时间才平衡了公司的账目。

en: This company owes its success to him.
zh: 这家公司的成功归功于他。

en: In some companies, employees use paid holidays for their summer vacations.
zh: 在一些公司，员工用带薪假期来度暑假。

en: Some of the company's executives are out of town for a conference.
zh: 公司的一些高管出差参加会议。

en: Scott's job is to evaluate the assets of companies.
zh: 斯科特的工作是评估公司的资产。

en: The office manager will explain to the new typist where she should work and what she should do.
zh: 办公室经理会向新打字员解释她应该在哪里工作以及应该做什么。

en: My responsibility is to keep the company solvent.
zh: 我的责任是保持公司偿付能力。

en: We used to meet at a coffee shop in Shinjuku after work.
zh: 我们过去常常在下班后在新宿的一家咖啡店见面。

en: He bore the future of the company on his shoulders.
zh: 他肩负着公司的未来。

en: The company is at the end of its rope.
zh: 公司已经走投无路了。

en: Want to grab a drink on the way home?
zh: 回家路上想喝一杯吗？

en: They chartered a bus for the firm's outing.
zh: 他们包了一辆巴士供公司郊游。

en: My company is sending us all to Hakone this year.
zh: 我们公司今年要送我们去箱根。

en: We all pigged out at the company Christmas party, especially on the roast beef.
zh: 在公司圣诞派对上，我们都吃撑了，尤其是烤牛肉。

en: New hires who just joined the company do everything in this timid manner.
zh: 刚加入公司的新员工都以这种胆怯的方式做事。

en: Some companies guarantee their workers a job for life.
zh: 有些公司保证他们的工人终身就业。

en: He's a pretty unique guy wearing bell bottoms and Hawaiian shirts to the office.

zh: 会议定于7月15日（星期二）下午、7月16日（星期三）全天和7月17日（星期四）上午举行。

zh: 猜猜总经理在会议开始时说了什么。他说的第一件事就是宣布一些重大的结构调整。

en: Absence makes the heart grow fonder.

en: The attendance at the party was larger than had been expected.

en: The meeting will take place next Monday.

en: How did you enjoy the party?

zh: 会议九点结束了。

en: The meeting broke up at five.
zh: 会议五点散会了。

en: The meeting was well attended.

en: You do not really understand a man till you have met him.

en: It's not until you have met him that you really understand a man.
zh: 只有见过他，你才能真正了解他。

en: I wonder if you could find some time to see me.
zh: 我想知道你是否能抽出时间见我一面。

en: It was around eight last night when the meeting broke up.
zh: 会议大约在昨晚八点左右结束。

en: Whenever they meet, they quarrel.

en: I never see her without wanting to kiss her.
zh: 每次见到她，我都想吻她。

en: Nice seeing you!
zh: 很高兴见到你！

en: It's been nice meeting you.
zh: 很高兴认识你。

en: I'm glad to see you.
zh: 很高兴见到你。

en: We never meet without parting.

en: It is nice of you to come and see me.
zh: 你来看我真是太好了。

en: Every time I go to see him, he is in bed.
zh: 每次我去看他，他都在床上。

en: You may bring anyone you want.
zh: 你可以带任何你想带的人来。

en: It is Tom whom I want to see.
zh: 我想见的人是汤姆。

en: When we were on the brink of starvation, they saved our lives.
zh: 当我们濒临饿死的时候，他们救了我们的命。

en: The buds are just showing.
zh: 花蕾刚开始显现。

en: Please advise us, if possible, of a company which has developed image processing software.
zh: 如果可能的话，请告知我们一家开发了图像处理软件的公司。

en: Where can I go to buy art books and catalogues?
zh: 我应该去哪里购买美术书籍和目录？

en: A painter only becomes a true painter by practicing his craft.
zh: 画家只有通过练习他的技艺才能成为真正的画家。

en: The artist captured the charm of the lady.
zh: 这位艺术家捕捉到了这位女士的魅力。

en: A painter's eyes are his most important tools.
zh: 画家的眼睛是他最重要的工具。

en: I'm not a toothless barking dog.
zh: 我不是一只没牙的吠犬。

en: I can't put up with it.
zh: 我受不了了。

en: I'll bite the bullet.
zh: 我会咬紧牙关挺过去的。

en: Bite the bullet.
zh: 咬紧牙关。

en: Our company has annual sales of a thousand million yen.
zh: 我们公司每年的销售额是十亿日元。

en: We Japanese live on rice.
zh: 我们日本人以米饭为主食。

en: We Japanese come of age at twenty.
zh: 我们日本人二十岁成年。

en: The two of us don't belong here.
zh: 我们俩不属于这里。

en: Not all of us can speak English.
zh: 我们并非所有人都会说英语。

en: We all agree to the new plan.
zh: 我们都同意这个新计划。

en: We consumers must buy more domestic products.
zh: 我们消费者必须购买更多的国货。

en: We students all like baseball.
zh: 我们学生都喜欢棒球。

en: We spent the afternoon fooling around on the beach.
zh: 我们一下午都在海滩上闲逛。

en: We students are now at our best.
zh: 我们学生现在正值最佳状态。

en: We were all assailed with fears.
zh: 我们都被恐惧所袭击。

en: He died, so we might live.
zh: 他死了，我们才能活下去。

en: We came together to form a group.
zh: 我们聚在一起组成了一个团体。

en: We had better do what other people do.
zh: 我们最好随大流。

en: Were you just pulling my leg when you said we were all going to get extra bonuses?
zh: 你刚才说我们都会得到额外的奖金，只是在开玩笑吗？

en: We were cut off while talking on the telephone.
zh: 我们打电话时被切断了。

en: We should hold old people in reverence.
zh: 我们应该尊敬老人。

en: We must provide for old age.
zh: 我们必须为老年做好准备。

en: We were worried we might miss the train.
zh: 我们担心可能会错过火车。

en: We started early so as not to miss the train.
zh: 我们早点出发，以免错过火车。

en: We are very interested in the history.
zh: 我们对历史非常感兴趣。

en: We helped each other to overcome the difficulties.
zh: 我们互相帮助克服困难。

en: We should cultivate our minds by reading good books.
zh: 我们应该通过阅读好书来陶冶情操。

en: We should obey our parents.
zh: 我们应该孝敬父母。

en: We had to walk the last leg of the journey.
zh: 我们不得不步行完成旅程的最后一段。

en: Can we check the rapid spread of the 'flu?
zh: 我们能阻止流感的迅速蔓延吗？

en: We rowed up the river against the current.
zh: 我们逆流而上划船。

en: We entered the room by the back door.
zh: 我们从后门进入房间。

en: We had to put off the meeting because of the storm.
zh: 由于暴风雨，我们不得不推迟会议。

en: We were caught in a storm.
zh: 我们遇到了暴风雨。

en: We took cover from the thunder shower.
zh: 我们躲避雷阵雨。

en: We agreed to start early the next morning.
zh: 我们同意第二天早上早点出发。

en: It is important that we make plans in relation to anticipated changes.
zh: 重要的是，我们要根据预期的变化制定计划。

en: We arrived here in the evening.
zh: 我们傍晚到达这里。

en: We got together for short meeting after dinner.
zh: 晚饭后我们聚在一起开了一个简短的会议。

en: We carried on the discussion till late at night.
zh: 我们一直讨论到深夜。

en: We talked late into the night.
zh: 我们聊到深夜。

en: We discussed the problem far into the night.
zh: 我们讨论这个问题到深夜。

en: We advanced under cover of darkness.
zh: 我们在夜幕的掩护下前进。

en: We passed through a town at night.
zh: 我们晚上穿过了一个城镇。

en: We use computers to solve problems and to put information in order.
zh: 我们使用计算机来解决问题和整理信息。

en: We have achieved all our aims.
zh: 我们已经实现了所有的目标。

en: We planted peanuts instead of cotton.
zh: 我们种了花生，没种棉花。

en: We'll likely go to the ball game tomorrow.
zh: 我们明天很可能会去看球赛。

en: We will have to get over the feeling of helplessness.
zh: 我们必须克服无力感。

en: We danced in the subdued lighting.
zh: 我们在柔和的灯光下跳舞。

en: We carried out our mission successfully.
zh: 我们成功地完成了任务。

en: We chaired the meeting democratically.
zh: 我们以民主的方式主持了会议。

en: We stand for democracy.
zh: 我们支持民主。

en: We believe in democracy.
zh: 我们相信民主。

en: We live in a society of democracy.
zh: 我们生活在一个民主社会。

en: We were looking for buried treasure.
zh: 我们当时在寻找埋藏的宝藏。

en: We heard it from Mr Such and such.
zh: 我们是从某某先生那里听说的。

en: We cannot really predict anything.
zh: 我们真的无法预测任何事情。

en: We should not resort to violence.
zh: 我们不应该诉诸暴力。

en: We will not bend to the will of a tyrant.
zh: 我们不会屈服于暴君的意志。

en: We are bound to obey the law.
zh: 我们有义务遵守法律。

en: We were attacked by swarms of bees.
zh: 我们受到了蜂群的攻击。

en: We gave our mother a watch.
zh: 我们送给妈妈一块手表。

en: We derive further pleasure from our study.
zh: 我们从学习中获得了更多的乐趣。

en: We broke up and went our own ways.
zh: 我们分手了，各走各的路。

en: We must preserve our peaceful constitution.
zh: 我们必须维护我们和平的宪法。

en: We parted, never to see each other again.
zh: 我们分手了，再也没有见过面。

en: We should try to make the conquest of peace.
zh: 我们应该努力去赢得和平。

en: We are a peace-loving nation.
zh: 我们是一个热爱和平的民族。

en: We are working in the interest of peace.
zh: 我们正在为和平的利益而努力。

en: We tried to project our analysis into the future.
zh: 我们试图将我们的分析推演到未来。

zh: 我们去那座山旅行时有当地向导。

en: We climbed up the mountain, but with difficulty.
zh: 我们爬上了山，但很困难。

en: We have established friendly relations with the new government of that country.
zh: 我们已经与该国新政府建立了友好关系。

en: We voted for the candidate.
zh: 我们投票支持了这位候选人。

en: We stayed at a hotel by the lake.
zh: 我们住在湖边的一家旅馆。

en: We camped on the border of the lake.
zh: 我们在湖的边界露营。

en: We fail to grasp the meaning of the word.
zh: 我们无法理解这个词的含义。

en: We found a secret passage into the building.
zh: 我们发现了一条通往大楼的秘密通道。

en: We found a secret door into the building.
zh: 我们发现了一扇通往大楼的暗门。

en: We balloted for the resolution.
zh: 我们对该决议进行了投票。

en: We must carry out that plan.
zh: 我们必须执行那个计划。

en: We talked over the plan with him.
zh: 我们和他讨论了那个计划。

en: We voted against the bill.
zh: 我们投票反对该法案。

en: We obeyed the rules.
zh: 我们遵守了规则。

en: We were talking to each other all the time.
zh: 我们一直都在互相交谈。

en: We gave the performer a clap.
zh: 我们为表演者鼓了掌。

en: We saw the film and had dinner together.
zh: 我们一起看了电影，吃了晚饭。

en: We confirmed the hotel reservations by telephone.
zh: 我们通过电话确认了酒店预订。

en: The whole building has been put at our disposal.
zh: 整栋大楼都供我们使用。

en: We were surprised at the news.
zh: 我们对这个消息感到惊讶。

en: We must look into the matter at once.
zh: 我们必须立即调查此事。

en: We made him go there.
zh: 我们让他去那里。

en: We began to see what we can deduce from it.
zh: 我们开始明白我们可以从中推断出什么。

en: We gathered all the books together and put them in the spare room.
zh: 我们把所有的书都收集起来，放在了空余的房间里。

en: We have to abolish all nuclear weapons, because they are deadly to mankind.
zh: 我们必须废除所有核武器，因为它们对人类是致命的。

en: We got all the materials together.
zh: 我们把所有的材料都收集起来了。

en: We have left undone what we ought to have done.
zh: 我们没有做我们应该做的事情。

en: We have come a long way.
zh: 我们已经走了很长的路。

en: We have to start at once.
zh: 我们必须立即开始。

en: We received an immediate answer to our letter.
zh: 我们收到了对我们信件的立即回复。

en: After much debate, we decided to spend our holidays in Spain.
zh: 经过多次辩论，我们决定在西班牙度假。

en: We elected Mr Jordan chairperson.
zh: 我们选举乔丹先生为主席。

en: We chopped our way through the jungle.
zh: 我们砍伐开路，穿过了丛林。

en: We sat up half the night just talking.
zh: 我们熬了半个晚上只是在聊天。

en: We spoke to no purpose.
zh: 我们白说了。

en: We pressed on, regardless.
zh: 我们不顾一切地继续前进。

en: We talked over Jack's plan to put in air conditioning, but could not come to a decision.
zh: 我们讨论了杰克安装空调的计划，但无法做出决定。

en: We talked to each other for a while.
zh: 我们互相聊了一会儿。

en: We often associate black with death.
zh: 我们经常把黑色和死亡联系起来。

en: We often fail to realize the extent to which we depend on others.
zh: 我们常常没有意识到我们在多大程度上依赖他人。

en: We were landed on a lonely island.
zh: 我们被困在一个孤岛上。

en: We must think about these plans in terms of what they would cost.
zh: 我们必须从成本的角度来考虑这些计划。

en: We've gotten into this fixed pattern.
zh: 我们已经陷入这种固定的模式。

en: We were granted the privilege of fishing in this bay.
zh: 我们被授予在这个海湾捕鱼的特权。

en: We've come to the conclusion that this is a true story.
zh: 我们得出的结论是，这是一个真实的故事。

en: We should face up to this issue.
zh: 我们应该面对这个问题。

en: We should approach this problem from different angles.
zh: 我们应该从不同的角度来解决这个问题。

en: We are in agreement on this subject.
zh: 我们在这个问题上达成了一致。

en: We have to somehow come through this troublesome situation.
zh: 我们必须想办法度过这个麻烦的局面。

en: We refer to this city as Little Kyoto.
zh: 我们把这座城市称为小京都。

en: We made fun of him about this.
zh: 我们拿这件事取笑他。

en: We mustn't make too much of this incident.
zh: 我们不能过分强调这件事。

en: We are solidly behind you.
zh: 我们坚定地支持你。

en: We must get over this difficulty.
zh: 我们必须克服这个困难。

en: We've been living here since July.
zh: 我们从七月开始就一直住在这里。

en: We made Mr Grey chairman of the committee.
zh: 我们选举格雷先生为委员会主席。

en: We studied Greek culture from various aspects.
zh: 我们从各个方面研究了希腊文化。

en: We ascribe his success to hard work.
zh: 我们把他的成功归功于努力工作。

en: We had been rival lovers at one time.
zh: 我们曾经是情敌。
